author: rdonkin
msg: Workaround for Java 1.2.2 compiler bug. Issue #31818.

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove the deprecated Log4JCategoryLog class, now that the trunk of Log4J
has finally removed the Category class.  In C-L, this has been deprecated
for a very long time, and is replaced (invisibly for most users) by

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix addressing null pointer when logging is loaded by boot classloader for JRE's that return a null classloader in this situtation. Issue #31710. Patch contributed by David Ferrero.

author: rdonkin
msg: Improved test for log4j availability. Patch from issue #31597

author: proyal
msg: Avalon Logger was broken by Serialization changes 13 months ago. Fixing and made not Serializable
since it cannot be Serializable if a Logger is explicitly passed in.
